verses.verse: Let a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3049>account<s%> of us, as of the <S%G5257>ministers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G3623>stewards<s%> of the <S%G3466>mysteries<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G3739>Moreover<s%> it is <S%G2212>required<s%> in <S%G3623>stewards,<s%> that a <S%G5100>man<s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G4103>faithful.<s%>

But with me it is a <S%G1646>very<s%> <S%G1646>small<s%> thing that I should be <S%G350>judged<s%> of you, <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G442>man's<s%> <S%G2250>judgment:<s%> <S%G235>yes,<s%> I <S%G350>judge<s%> not <S%G1683>my<s%> <S%G1683>own<s%> <S%G1683>self.<s%>

For I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> by <S%G1683>myself;<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> am I not <S%G1722>hereby<s%> <S%G5129><s%> <S%G1344>justified:<s%> but he that <S%G350>judges<s%> me is the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3385>nothing<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2540>time,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> will <S%G5461>bring<s%> to <S%G5461>light<s%> the <S%G2927>hidden<s%> things of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> and will <S%G5319>make<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> the <S%G1012>counsels<s%> of the <S%G2588>hearts:<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> shall <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G1096>have<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G5023>these<s%> things, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> I have in a <S%G3345>figure<s%> <S%G3345>transferred<s%> to <S%G1683>myself<s%> and to <S%G625>Apollos<s%> for <S%G5209>your<s%> sakes; that you might <S%G3129>learn<s%> in us not to <S%G5426>think<s%> of men <S%G5228>above<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G1125>written,<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of you be <S%G5448>puffed<s%> up for <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G2087>another.<s%>

For <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1252>makes<s%> you to <S%G1252>differ<s%> from another? and <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> you that you did not <S%G2983>receive?<s%> <S%G2532>now<s%> <S%G1499>if<s%> you did <S%G2983>receive<s%> it, <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G2744>glory,<s%> as if you had not <S%G2983>received<s%> it?

<S%G2236>Now<s%> you are <S%G2880>full,<s%> <S%G2236>now<s%> you are <S%G4147>rich,<s%> you have <S%G936>reigned<s%> as kings <S%G5565>without<s%> us: and I <S%G3785>would<s%> to God you did <S%G936>reign,<s%> that we <S%G2532>also<s%> might <S%G4821>reign<s%> with you.

For I <S%G1380>think<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G584>set<s%> <S%G584>forth<s%> us the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2078>last,<s%> as it were <S%G1935>appointed<s%> to <S%G1935>death:<s%> for we are <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G2302>spectacle<s%> to the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and to <S%G32>angels,<s%> and to <S%G444>men.<s%>

We are <S%G3474>fools<s%> for <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> sake, but you are <S%G5429>wise<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> we are <S%G772>weak,<s%> but you are <S%G2478>strong;<s%> you are <S%G1741>honorable,<s%> but we are <S%G820>despised.<s%>

Even to <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G737>present<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> we <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3983>hunger,<s%> and <S%G1372>thirst,<s%> and are <S%G1130>naked,<s%> and are <S%G2852>buffeted,<s%> and have <S%G790>no<s%> <S%G790>certain<s%> dwelling <S%G790>place;<s%>
And <S%G2872>labor,<s%> <S%G2038>working<s%> with our <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5495>hands:<s%> being <S%G3058>reviled,<s%> we <S%G2127>bless;<s%> being <S%G1377>persecuted,<s%> we <S%G430>suffer<s%> it:

Being <S%G987>defamed,<s%> we <S%G3870>entreat:<s%> we are <S%G1096>made<s%> as the <S%G4027>filth<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and are the <S%G4067>offscouring<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> things to <S%G737>this<s%> <S%G737>day.<s%>
I <S%G1125>write<s%> not <S%G5023>these<s%> things to <S%G1788>shame<s%> you, but as my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5043>sons<s%> I <S%G3560>warn<s%> you.

For <S%G1437>though<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3463>ten<s%> <S%G3563>thousand<s%> <S%G3807>instructors<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> have you not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3962>fathers:<s%> for in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> I have <S%G1080>begotten<s%> you <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>
<S%G3767>Why<s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you, be you <S%G3402>followers<s%> of me.

For <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> have I sent to you <S%G5095>Timotheus,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5043>son,<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> shall <S%G363>bring<s%> you into <S%G363>remembrance<s%> of my <S%G3598>ways<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> be in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> as I <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G3837>every<s%> <S%G3837>where<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1577>church.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> are <S%G5448>puffed<s%> up, as though I would not <S%G2064>come<s%> to you.

But I will <S%G2064>come<s%> to you <S%G5030>shortly,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2309>will,<s%> and will <S%G1097>know,<s%> not the <S%G3056>speech<s%> of them which are <S%G5448>puffed<s%> up, but the <S%G1411>power.<s%>
For the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is not in <S%G3056>word,<s%> but in <S%G1411>power.<s%>
<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> you? shall I <S%G2064>come<s%> to you with a <S%G4464>rod,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> in <S%G26>love,<s%> and in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4236>meekness?<s%>
